verses.verse: To the angel <WG32> of the church <WG1577> in Ephesus <WG2179> write <WG1125>: These things <WG3592> saith <WG3004> he that holdeth <WG2902> the seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> in <WG1722> his <WG846> right hand <WG1188>, he that walketh <WG4043> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> candlesticks <WG3087>:

I know <WG1492> thy <WG4675> works <WG2041>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> toil <WG2873> and2532, 4675 patience <WG5281>, and <WG2532> that <WG3754> thou canst <WG1410> not <WG3756> bear <WG941> evil <WG2556> men <WG2532>, and didst try <WG3985> them that call <WG5335> themselves <WG1511> apostles <WG652>, and <WG2532> they are <WG1511> not <WG3756>, and <WG2532> didst find <WG2147> them <WG846> false <WG5571>;
and <WG2532> thou hast <WG2192> patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> didst bear <WG941> for <WG1223> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>'s sake <WG1223>, and <WG2532> hast <WG2577> not <WG3756> grown weary <WG2577>.
But <WG235> I have <WG2192> this against <WG2596> thee <WG4675>, that <WG3754> thou didst leave <WG863> thy <WG4675> first <WG4413> love <WG26>.

Remember <WG3421> therefore <WG3767> whence <WG4159> thou art fallen <WG1601>, and <WG2532> repent <WG3340> and <WG2532> do <WG4160> the first <WG4413> works <WG2041>; or else <WG4190> I come <WG2064> to thee <WG4671>, <WG5035> and <WG2532> will move <WG2795> thy <WG4675> candlestick <WG3087> out of <WG1537> its <WG846> place <WG5117>, except <WG3362> thou repent <WG3340>.
But <WG235> this <WG5124> thou hast <WG2192>, that <WG3754> thou hatest <WG3404> the works <WG2041> of the Nicolaitans <WG3531>, which <WG3739> I also <WG2504> hate <WG3404>.

He that hath <WG2192> an ear <WG3775>, let him hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the Spirit <WG4151> saith <WG3004> to the churches <WG1577>. To him <WG846> that overcometh <WG3528>, to him will I give <WG1325> to eat <WG5315> of <WG1537> the tree <WG3586> of life <WG2222>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> the <WG3319> Paradise <WG3857> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> to the angel <WG32> of the church <WG1577> in Smyrna <WG4668> write <WG1125>: These things <WG3592> saith <WG3004> the first <WG4413> and <WG2532> the last <WG2078>, who <WG3739> was <WG1096> dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> lived again <WG2198>:

I know <WG1492> thy4675, Exodus41, 2532 tribulation <WG2347>, and <WG2532> thy poverty <WG4432> (but <WG1161> thou art <WG1488> rich <WG4145>), and <WG2532> the blasphemy <WG988> of them that <WG3588> say <WG3004> they <WG1438> are <WG1511> Jews <WG2453>, and <WG2532> they <WG1438> art not <WG3756>, but <WG235> are a synagogue <WG4864> of Satan <WG4567>.

Fear <WG5399> not <WG3367> the things which <WG3739> thou art about <WG3195> to suffer <WG3958>: behold <WG2400>, the devil <WG1228> is about <WG3195> to cast <WG906> some of <WG1537> you <WG5216> into <WG1519> prison <WG5438>, that <WG2443> ye may be tried <WG3985>; and <WG2532> ye shall have <WG2192> tribulation <WG2347> ten <WG1176> days <WG2250>. Be thou <WG1096> faithful <WG4103> unto <WG891> death <WG2288>, and <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> thee <WG4671> the crown <WG4735> of life <WG2222>.

He that hath <WG2192> an ear <WG3775>, let him hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the Spirit <WG4151> saith <WG3004> to the churches <WG1577>. He that overcometh <WG3528> shall <WG91> not <WG3364> be hurt <WG91> of <WG1537> the second <WG1208> death <WG2288>.

and <WG2532> to the angel <WG32> of the church <WG1577> in <WG1722> Pergamum <WG4010> write <WG1125>: These things <WG3592> saith <WG3004> he that hath <WG2192> the <WG4501> sharp <WG3691> two-edged <WG1366> sword <WG4501>:

I know <WG1492> where <WG4226> thou dwellest <WG2730>, even where <WG3699> Satan <WG4567>'s throne <WG2362> is <WG2532>; and thou holdest fast <WG2902> my <WG3450> name <WG3686>, and <WG2532> didst <WG720> not <WG3756> deny <WG720> my <WG3450> faith <WG4102>, even <WG2532> in <WG1722> the days2250, 1722 of <WG3739> Antipas <WG493> my <WG3450> witness <WG3144>, my <WG3450> faithful <WG4103> one <WG3739>, who was killed <WG615> among <WG3844> you <WG5213>, where <WG3699> Satan <WG4567> dwelleth <WG2730>.

But <WG235> I have <WG2192> a few things <WG3641> against <WG2596> thee <WG4675>, because <WG3754> thou hast <WG2192> there <WG1563> some that hold <WG2902> the teaching <WG1322> of Balaam <WG903>, who <WG3739> taught <WG1321> Balak <WG904> to cast <WG906> a stumblingblock <WG4625> before <WG1799> the children <WG5207> of Israel <WG2474>, to eat <WG5315> things sacrificed to idols <WG1494>, and <WG2532> to commit fornication <WG4203>.
So <WG3779> hast <WG2192> thou <WG4771> also <WG2532> some that hold <WG2902> the teaching <WG1322> of the Nicolaitans <WG3531> in like <WG3739> manner <WG3404>.

Repent <WG3340> therefore <WG1487>; or else3361, 1161 I come <WG2064> to thee <WG4671> quickly <WG5035>, and <WG2532> I will make war <WG4170> against <WG3326> them <WG846> with <WG1722> the sword <WG4501> of <WG4750> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750>.

He that hath <WG2192> an ear <WG3775>, let him hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the Spirit <WG4151> saith <WG3004> to the churches <WG1577>. To him <WG846> that overcometh <WG3528>, to him <WG846> will I give <WG1325> of <WG575> the hidden <WG2928> manna <WG3131>, and <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> him <WG846> a white <WG3022> stone <WG5586>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the stone <WG5586> a new <WG2537> name <WG3686> written <WG1125>, which <WG3739> no one <WG3762> knoweth <WG1097> but1487, 3361 he that receiveth it <WG2983>.

And <WG2532> to the angel <WG32> of the church <WG1577> in <WG1722> Thyatira <WG2363> write <WG1125>: These things <WG3592> saith <WG3004> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, who hath <WG2192> his <WG846> eyes <WG3788> like <WG5613> a flame <WG5395> of fire <WG4442>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> feet <WG4228> are like <WG3664> unto burnished brass <WG5474>:

I know <WG1492> thy <WG4675> works <WG2041>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> love <WG26> and <WG2532> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> ministry <WG2041> and <WG2532> patience <WG5281>, and <WG2532> that thy <WG4675> last <WG2078> works <WG2041> are more <WG4119> than the first <WG4413>.

But <WG235> I have <WG2192> this <WG3641> against <WG2596> thee <WG4675>, that <WG3754> thou sufferest <WG1439> the woman <WG1135> Jezebel <WG2403>, who calleth <WG3004> herself <WG1438> a prophetess <WG4398>; and she teacheth <WG1321> and <WG2532> seduceth <WG4105> my <WG1699> servants <WG1401> to commit fornication <WG4203>, and <WG2532> to eat <WG5315> things sacrificed to idols <WG1494>.
And <WG2532> I gave <WG1325> her <WG846> time <WG5550> that she should <WG2443> repent <WG3340>; and <WG2532> she willeth not <WG3756> to repent <WG3340> of <WG1537> her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>.

Behold <WG2400>, I <WG1473> cast <WG906> her <WG846> into <WG1519> a bed <WG2825>, and <WG2532> them that commit adultery <WG3431> with <WG3326> her <WG846> into <WG1519> great <WG3173> tribulation <WG2347>, except1437, 3361 they repent <WG3340> of <WG1537> her <WG846> works <WG2041>.

And <WG2532> I will kill <WG615> her <WG846> children <WG5043> with <WG1722> death <WG2288>; and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577> shall know <WG1097> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> he that searcheth <WG2045> the reins <WG3510> and <WG2532> hearts <WG2588>: and <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> unto <WG5213> each one of <WG1538> you <WG5213> according to <WG2596> your <WG5216> works <WG2041>.

But <WG1161> to you <WG5213> I say <WG3004>, to <WG2532> the rest <WG3062> that are in <WG1722> Thyatira <WG2363>, as <WG3745> many as <WG3745> have <WG2192> not <WG3756> this <WG3778> teaching <WG1322>, who <WG3748> know <WG1097> not <WG3756> the deep things <WG899> of Satan <WG4567>, as <WG5613> they are wont to say <WG3004>; I cast <WG906> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209> none <WG3756> other <WG243> burden <WG922>.
Nevertheless <WG4133> that which <WG3739> ye have <WG2192>, hold fast <WG2902> till3739, Leviticus2 I come <WG2240>.

And <WG2532> he that overcometh <WG3528>, and <WG2532> he that keepeth <WG5083> my <WG3450> works <WG2041> unto <WG891> the end <WG5056>, to him <WG846> will I give <WG1325> authority <WG1849> over <WG1909> the nations <WG1484>:

and <WG2532> he shall rule <WG4165> them <WG846> with <WG1722> a rod <WG4464> of iron <WG4603>, as <WG5613> the vessels <WG4632> of the potter <WG2764> are broken to shivers <WG4937>; as <WG5613> I <WG2504> also have received <WG2983> of <WG3844> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>:
and <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> him <WG846> the <WG792> morning <WG4407> star <WG792>.
He that hath <WG2192> an ear <WG3775>, let him hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the Spirit <WG4151> saith <WG3004> to the churches <WG1577>.
